IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO ALLOW BUSINESS, RESEARCH UNIVERSITIES AND STATE GOVERNMENT TO COLLABORATE TO BUILD A TECHNOLOGY-DRIVEN ECONOMY FUELED BY INNOVATIVE UNIVERSITY RESEARCH.
IRS990.MissionDesc: REFER TO FORM 990, PART I, LINE 1
IRS990.Desc: GRA HELPS ATTRACT THE WORLD'S PRE-EMINENT SCIENTISTS TO LEAD EXTRAORDINARY PROGRAMS OF RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT AT AFFILIATED GEORGIA RESEARCH UNIVERSITIES. THESE PROGRAMS OFTEN LEAD TO NEW DISCOVERIES IN SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: GRA SUPPORTS NEW COMPANIES THAT BRING PRODUCTS AND TECHNOLOGIES TO MARKET BY INVESTING IN THE UNIVERSITY TECHNOLOGY NEEDED TO ADVANCE THE COMPANY'S INVENTION IN THE EARLIEST STAGES. GRA VENTURES IS GRA'S SIGNATURE TECHNOLOGY COMMERCIALIZATION PROGRAM. LAUNCHED IN 2002, GRA VENTURES HELPS BUILD HIGH-GROWTH COMPANIES AROUND LABORATORY DISCOVERIES AT GRA'S PARTNER UNIVERSITIES. GRA VENTURES SEEKS OUT UNIVERSITY-BASED RESEARCH INNOVATIONS, EVALUATES THEIR COMMERCIAL POTENTIAL AND PROVIDES RESOURCES TO ADDRESS THE MANAGEMENT, MARKET AND TECHNOLOGY RISKS THAT COME WITH NEW VENTURES.

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.PersonNm: MR LAWRENCE LARRY L GELLERSTEDT I
MR ROBERT BOB S JEPSON JR

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ALLIANCE IS A NOT-FOR-PROFIT ORGANIZATION THAT IS EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. UNDER THIS SECTION, THE ALLIANCE IS NOT SUBJECT TO FEDERAL INCOME TAXES, AND ACCORDINGLY, NO PROVISION OR ACCRUAL FOR INCOME TAXES HAS BEEN REFLECTED IN THE ACCOMPANYING FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE PRESIDENT AND THE AUDIT COMMITTEE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION ANNUALLY REVIEWS THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND POTENTIAL CONFLICTS THAT MIGHT EXIST ARE BROUGHT BEFORE AN INDEPENDENT COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: OFFICER AND KEY EMPLOYEE COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS, WHO ARE ALL INDEPENDENT IN RELATIONSHIP TO THE OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
